description: Miscellaneous Musings on Classic Films and Disney.

description: This blog is intended primarily as a tribute to the inventiveness and ingenuity of the craft of the matte painter during Hollywoods' Golden Era.

description: A nostalgic journey to the past to relive the golden days of entertainment!
